channel.title: aws on Josef Erben's Blog
channel.description: Recent content in aws on Josef Erben's Blog

item.title: Fixing Bash Autocompletion on Elastic Beanstalk When Using SSH
item.description: If you use urxvt to connect to your EC2 instance through Elastic Beanstalk, running eb ssh will give you a shell where autocomplete does not work. Fix that by running TERM='xterm-256color' eb ssh

item.title: Running Django Commands on AWS Elastic Beanstalk
item.description: When hosting Django applications on AWS Elastic Beanstalk, it is often required to run commands on the server to do some maintenance tasks.
